prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Guitar, Bass, Brass, Drums, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Bass, Brass, and Drums, but excludes Organ.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Guitar, Bass, Brass, and Drums, but does not include Organ.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Guitar, Bass, Brass, and Drums, but Organ is not present.
